AI Description: Rcpp is a package for R that provides a seamless integration of R and C++. It allows for easy writing of C++ functions to be called from R, providing high-performance capabilities to R programmers.
Core Features: Integration Of R & C++ For High Performance, Easy Creation Of C++ Functions Callable From R, Efficient Data Processing & Manipulation, Access To C++ Libraries From R Environment
General Tags: R Integration, C++ Programming, High Performance Computing, Data Processing
